div.a: The Needless Tragedy Of Student Loan Defaults

div.div: For the first time on record, the delinquency rate on student loans has jumped above the rate for credit cards, car loans, or any other kind of consumer loan. The tragedy? Many of those loans will default, with stunningly harsh consequences.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QMCvJJ&via=Digg&text=The Needless Tragedy Of Student Loan Defaults

div.div: YOUR UPS DRIVER WILL DESPISE YOU

div.a: What's The Heaviest Thing Amazon Will Ship For Free?

div.div: For an annual fee of $79, Amazon.com AMZN +1.52% offers customers free two-day shipping on most of its inventory — a business model that defies conventional wisdom and, perhaps, the laws of gravity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V3fY6p&via=Digg&text=What's The Heaviest Thing Amazon Will Ship For Free?

div.a: New Video Emerges Of F-18 Crashing Into Apartment Building

div.div: These are the first images ever recorded of the Navy F-18′s catastrophic crash into Mayfair Mews Apartments.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UUXvLx&via=Digg&text=New Video Emerges Of F-18 Crashing Into Apartment Building

div.a: The Powerball FAQ Is Bizarrely Snarky

div.div: "If you like to be rude and yell at people who won't be rude back, then the state lottery is where you should write--they are professionals. We have a very small staff here with no one who has the job of responding to letters."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/9NcpK&via=Digg&text=The Powerball FAQ Is Bizarrely Snarky

div.a: New iTunes Expected Thursday Following Delay Due To Engineering Issues

div.div: In a profile of Apple SVP Eddy Cue, the Wall Street Journal reports that Apple’s new iTunes 11 app will debut Thursday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RjLy4A&via=Digg&text=New iTunes Expected Thursday Following Delay Due To Engineering Issues

div.a: Anthony Bourdain May Have Accidentally Discovered Evidence Of Secret Service Keg Party

div.div: The guys who rented our phones in #Myanmar before us were Secret Service. They should really have deleted their texts. #Kegparty!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V6afxb&via=Digg&text=Anthony Bourdain May Have Accidentally Discovered Evidence Of Secret Service Keg Party

div.a: If Buildings Looked Like They Were In 'Inception'

div.div: A series of mind-bending, deconstructed images of an abandoned hospital in Valencia to make a statement about “urban recycling”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsWBoU&via=Digg&text=If Buildings Looked Like They Were In 'Inception'

div.a: Study Finds U.S. Jails Could Handle Guantanamo Detainees

div.div: The controversial detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, could be closed and the 166 detainees being held there could be absorbed safely by U.S. prisons, a government report says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UcTjWT&via=Digg&text=Study Finds U.S. Jails Could Handle Guantanamo Detainees

div.div: Stuck on the moon without a hammer? Research suggests you may one day be able to print one from moon dust.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tmh2TB&via=Digg&text=The Self-Sufficient Lunar 3D Printer

div.a: Worse Than Bedbugs, It’s The Couch Itself

div.div: Yet another threat to our modern-day lifestyle has arisen: the couch you so thoroughly love.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wv8qe1&via=Digg&text=Worse Than Bedbugs, It’s The Couch Itself

div.a: How To Get An Online Girlfriend (Or Boyfriend)

div.div: Single? Looking for love? Spend time on the internet? Have I got a book for you. A Japanese book. With some dirty pictures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SdgiBf&via=Digg&text=How To Get An Online Girlfriend (Or Boyfriend)

div.a: The Laser Rainbow Tribute To Hurricane Sandy Victims

div.div: The laser-beamed art project by artist Yvette Mattern is powerful enough to cross from Manhattan to the storm-devastated neighborhoods of Brooklyn and Queens, providing a little hope to still-recovering communities that calm is on the way.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YqqxHy&via=Digg&text=The Laser Rainbow Tribute To Hurricane Sandy Victims

div.div: Prostitutes in Zurich will be able to conduct business in drive-in sex booths beginning next year in a move that officials in the Swiss city hope will help make the sex industry safer and more regulated.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UcBl6Z&via=Digg&text=Introducing The Drive-In Sex Booth

div.div: The first successful landing on the Chinese aircraft carrier Liaoning has spawned a viral Internet hit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tr6lze&via=Digg&text='Shootering' Is The New Eastwooding

div.div: STILL NO CURE FOR CRACKED SCREENS

div.a: How To Fix An iPhone's Unresponsive Home Button

div.div: If you're out of warranty and your home button is no longer working, have no fear. There's a solution.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UUxzzM&via=Digg&text=How To Fix An iPhone's Unresponsive Home Button

div.a: The Weird Things People Do In Their Sleep

div.div: Increasing numbers of people are asking for help with sleep disorders and some of them are doing rather strange things during the night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y2Gx3u&via=Digg&text=The Weird Things People Do In Their Sleep

div.a: Fox News Alert Scares Its Own Anchor

div.div: Fox News has always had a way with fear. Now they've gotten so good, they're even terrifying their own anchors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V6Fbxd&via=Digg&text=Fox News Alert Scares Its Own Anchor

div.a: Did This Plane Get Lost On The Way To The Nearest Airport?

div.div: Nigeria's capital city, Abuja, boasts much of the typical urban architectural fare: glass-paneled office buildings, concrete towers, and...a house made out of an airplane.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/St9bof&via=Digg&text=Did This Plane Get Lost On The Way To The Nearest Airport?

div.a: The Most Gourmet City On Earth

div.div: And the best city on Earth to be a diner is...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QL01Xk&via=Digg&text=The Most Gourmet City On Earth

div.a: NFL Player Claims Some Use Viagra For Football Enhancement

div.div: The NFL’s fight against performance-enhancing drug use amongst its players has focused recently on Adderall, but at least one player is warning about a very different drug.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y6CKCp&via=Digg&text=NFL Player Claims Some Use Viagra For Football Enhancement

div.a: Away From Scranton, Dunder Mifflin Thrives

div.div: While the fictional Scranton manufacturer may have struggled as a third-rate company comprised of lovable, if hapless, dolts, Quill has built Dunder Mifflin (in a licensing deal with NBCUniversal) into a million-dollar brand.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsTr4H&via=Digg&text=Away From Scranton, Dunder Mifflin Thrives

div.a: How Stealing Land From Native Americans Paid Off The US Debt

div.div: The United States once made a short visit to the supposedly virtuous, debt-free promised land. But it was only as a result of widespread land speculation that resulted in financial crisis, and widespread dispossession that resulted in terrible human suffering.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VdUv0I&via=Digg&text=How Stealing Land From Native Americans Paid Off The US Debt

div.div: IT BURNS, OH GOD IT BURNS!

div.a: Sriracha Lip Balm: Pucker Up For A Fiery Kiss

div.div: West Coast bacon impresarios, J&D Foods, and The Oatmeal have teamed up for the collaboration that promises to be "like making out with tasty napalm.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ses3rb&via=Digg&text=Sriracha Lip Balm: Pucker Up For A Fiery Kiss

div.div: Warner Brothers has posted eight beautifully restored versions of these films for free viewing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsKkCu&via=Digg&text=Watch The First Superman Cartoon

div.a: One Running Shoe In The Grave

div.div: Running too fast, too far and for too many years may speed one’s progress toward the finish line of life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tk2948&via=Digg&text=One Running Shoe In The Grave
